sentence: State treasurer Sarah Godlewski and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson, both running for U.S. Senate, attacked Republican U.S. Sen. Ron Johnson, who has downplayed the attack.
author: Bill Glauber
title: Sarah Godlewski, Tom Nelson use Jan. 6 anniversary to criticize Ron Johnson, who has minimized the insurrection

sentence: Mandela Barnes, state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry and Tom Nelson, the Outagamie County executive.
title: Republicans 'all in' for Ron Johnson's Senate re-election fight in Wisconsin
